meanings: Adverb <형용사 최상급 앞에 쓰여 강조의 뜻을 나타냄> , (own 앞에 쓰여) 바로

vlive.english: You look very hip and nice!

vlive.korean: 오~ 얘도 길다 확실히~ Oh! He's also very long! For sure. 듣기 View video ASTRO : 초콜릿스트로🍫
vlive.english: Oh! He's also very long! For sure.

examples.korean: ‘Very quickly indeed’ is an adverbial phrase. 듣기 Add to Wordbook very quickly indeed는 부사구이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: Yogurt is usually very low in fat. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 요구르트는 보통 지방 성분이 아주 적다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
